scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.setup: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const env=fs.readFileSync('.env','utf8');const key=env.match(/GEMINI_API_KEY=(.+)/)?.[1];if(key)fs.writeFileSync('.dev.vars','GEMINI_API_KEY='+key.trim()+'\n');console.log(key?'✓ Copied GEMINI_API_KEY to .dev.vars':'✗ GEMINI_API_KEY not found in .env');"
